short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is not YouTube as entertainment, it is YouTube as a tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you find yourself spending too much time on YouTube, enjoy this stripped-back version of the site. Focus for YouTube is free of the infamous algorithm and boasts a clean, simple interface - you won't spend long here. This is not YouTube as entertainment, it is YouTube as a tool.

Features:
- clean, minimal interface
- removed sidebar menus
- removed recommendations
- removed YouTube shorts
- removed subscriptions
- removed comment creation
- disabled channel links
- removed search suggestions

Credit:
- development by Aadam Gafar
